T02D2892:242b-0: badzra p'a ni @242b n'i l'am bar dha ra n'a ga ba lim bi dhi /
T02D2892:242b-2: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi klu
T02D2892:242b-3: gtor gyi cho ga / bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i
T02D2892:242b-4: rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2892:242b-6: rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2892:242b-7: byams dang snying rje byang chub sems //
T02D2892:242b-8: yang nas yang du bsgom byas nas //
T02D2892:242b-9: mdun du pam las padma ni //
T02D2892:242b-10: kha dog dmar po 'dab brgyad de //
T02D2892:242b-11: phu: brgyad las ni klu brgyad bskyed //
T02D2892:242b-12: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer dang //
T02D2892:242b-13: aom pheem phu: zhes pas klu chen brgyad //
T02D2892:242b-14: 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la bstim //
T02D2892:242b-15: dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas //
T02D2892:242b-16: dam tshig ye shes klu rnams mchod //
T02D2892:242b-17: de nas gtor ma byin brlab ste //
T02D2892:242b-18: snod ni kham las rin po che //
T02D2892:242b-19: shin tu mdzes shing blta na sdug / yangs la rgya ni che bar bsgom //
T02D2892:242b-20: rin chen snod mchog de nang du //
T02D2892:242b-21: dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas //
T02D2892:242b-22: snod ni shin tu gang bar bsam //
T02D2892:242b-23: de yi steng du yi ge gsum //
T02D2892:242b-24: kha dog dri dang ro sbyangs dang //
T02D2892:242b-25: bdud rtsi ro mchog brgyad dang ldan //
T02D2892:242b-26: g-yas pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya la //
T02D2892:242b-27: ha ho: hr'i: bam dag las ni //
T02D2892:242b-28: dpag bsam shing chen bsam byas la //
T02D2892:242b-29: lo ma yal ga thams cad la //
T02D2892:242b-30: rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis gang //
T02D2892:242b-31: dpag tu med pa bsams nas ni //
T02D2892:242b-32: brum las bdud rtsi'i char babs pas //
T02D2892:242b-33: gtor ma yongs su gang bar bsam //
T02D2892:242b-34: aom a'a:h'um zhes lan gsum brjod //
T02D2892:242b-35: mgron rnams thams cad lce las ni //
T02D2892:242b-36: h'um las rdo rje sbu gus rngub //
T02D2892:242b-37: aom ba su ki ai mam ba lim ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2892:242b-38: aom taksha ka ai mam ba lim ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2892:242b-40: aom hu lu ta ka / aom padma /
T02D2892:242b-44: aom n'a ga pa na sam khru ha ra ha
T02D2892:242b-45: ra ai mam ba lim ta kha kha kh'a hi
T02D2892:242b-46: kh'a hi / ai mam ba lim tsam la gdags //
T02D2892:242b-47: aom pheem klu'i rgyal po sog ma med //
T02D2892:242b-48: ai mam ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2892:242b-49: aom mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas bu //
T02D2892:242b-50: 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //
T02D2892:242b-52: dung skyong dang ni rigs ldan dang //
T02D2892:242b-53: lha mo lha mo chen mo dang //
T02D2892:242b-54: zla ba zla ba spyi gtsug che //
T02D2892:242b-55: snying po med dang hu lunta //
T02D2892:242b-56: dga' bo dang ni nyer dga' dang //
T02D2892:242b-57: rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che //
T02D2892:242b-58: gdung ba dang ni gdung ba che //
T02D2892:243a-0: @243a * // rin chen 'od dang gzugs bzang dang //
T02D2892:243a-1: gzugs chen 'od dang sprul bzang lto 'phye che //
T02D2892:243a-2: smig rgyu dang ni smig rgyu che //
T02D2892:243a-3: klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
T02D2892:243a-4: 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma bzhes //
T02D2892:243a-5: mdzes pa'i dkar gsum gtor ma 'di //
T02D2892:243a-6: mngar gsum 'o ma'i rgya mtshor bcas //
T02D2892:243a-7: rin chen phreng ba'i them skas can //
T02D2892:243a-8: klu yi gnod pa skyob byed pa //
T02D2892:243a-9: mthun pa'i rdzas su 'di gyur cig / mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
T02D2892:243a-10: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams la //
T02D2892:243a-11: klu las gyur pa'i nad rnams ni //
T02D2892:243a-12: mthong ba'i dug dang kha rlangs dug / bsam pa'i dug la sogs pa kun //
T02D2892:243a-13: de dag thams cad zhi gyur cig / bdag pas gces pa'i rdzas khyer la //
T02D2892:243a-14: bdag la gnod pa ma byed par //
T02D2892:243a-15: rtag tu byams pa'i sems dang ni //
T02D2892:243a-16: pha ma lta bu'i sems kyis ltos //
T02D2892:243a-17: gzhan yang las las skyes pa yi //
T02D2892:243a-18: bka' dang dam las thogs pa yi //
T02D2892:243a-19: gdug pa can gyi tshogs rnams kun / bka' yi pham 'bab 'di snoms la //
T02D2892:243a-20: so so rang re'i gnas su dengs //
T02D2892:243a-21: nyon cig nyon cig rigs kyi bu //
T02D2892:243a-22: ji ltar sa bon tsha ba la //
T02D2892:243a-23: myu gu tsha ba 'byung ba ltar //
T02D2892:243a-24: so so rang re'i gnas la sbyon //
T02D2892:243a-25: 'byung bzhi so sor gyur yang srid //
T02D2892:243a-26: bde gshegs bka' las 'gyur ba med //
T02D2892:243a-28: de las khyod sdig mi byed par //
T02D2892:243a-29: dge ba'i bsam pas gnas par gyis //
T02D2892:243a-30: bden pa bdar la chos bshad bya //
T02D2892:243a-31: de rjes yi ge brgya pa brjod //
T02D2892:243a-32: ye shes klu rnams gshegs su gsol //
T02D2892:243a-33: dam tshig pa ni mi dmigs bsam //
T02D2892:243a-34: gtor ma rgya mtsho chen po'am //
T02D2892:243a-35: yang na gnod pa'i phyogs su gtong //
